buildup.text: Johannes Gutenberg combined movable type, an oil-based ink, and a wine press to create the printing press in Mainz

twist.text: The printing press terrified authorities. If anyone could read the Bible, who needed priests to interpret it? The

climax.text: Gutenberg didn't just invent a machine. He broke the monopoly on knowledge and set in motion revolutions in science

It massively increased book production and broke the monopoly on knowledge
